citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on
30JUN2022.
I knocked on the door. I was approached in the driveway by a neighbor that told me that the Whetstone family was on
vacation in Ohio until 02JUL2022.
A sorry I missed you flyer was left inside the screen door with directions to contact me.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on 
30JUN2022. 
I knocked on the door.  I was approached in the driveway by a neighbor that told me that the Whetstone family was on 
vacation in Ohio until 02JUL2022. 
A sorry I missed you flyer was left inside the screen door with directions to contact me. 
 
 
 
End Section
